about_the_game:
Plunge into the criminal atmosphere and feel like a real investigator in the "Unsolved Case: Murderous Script DLC" interactive story! Additional mysterious locations with a lot of clues and evidence you will need to find, secrets and collector’s items await you in each episode of the series! There are many mysteries to unravel – murders on the train, at a Halloween fair, in a theater. Not all suspects want to cooperate and are hiding the truth, which you need to discover, and what's more, you need to catch criminals who are a threat to others and make your city a better place! It's not an easy task, but your partner will help you. Believe in yourself and your superior detective skills!

The detective adventure continues with the additional content "Unsolved Case: Murderous Script DLC" with devious criminals, unique crime scenes and unexpected plot twists. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

🧩 SEARCH THE HOUSE OF THE FAMOUS ATTORNEY!
Not all lawyers are innocent and often commit crimes themselves. Search the beach house and find out juicy details about the case!

🧩 EXPLORE AN ABANDONED FARM!
Find a place that is off the map and learn more about the murderer and his motives! But are you truly alone in this godforsaken place?

🧩 FIND OUT WHAT IS HIDING BEHIND CHARMING PERSONALITY!
Unlock access to the hotel room where the criminal was staying and find out about his obsession!

🧩 GAIN THE ACCESS TO THE CRUISE LINER!
Explore the actress' private cabin on the cruise liner, learn more about her life and regrets!
